categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Attros Finn was a male Mirialan Jedi Knight serving the Jedi Order as a medical researcher at the Senate Tower on Coruscant during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

A Force-sensitive Mirialan, Attros Finn was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, attaining the rank of Jedi Knight and Consular. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire, Finn was stationed at the Senate Building on Coruscant, using his unique skills as a healer and a medical researcher to aid ailing Senators and Jedi. During this time, he was assisted by droids and living medics, including a Twi'lek woman named Pharen.

In 3643 BBY, Jedi Master Yuon Par was placed under his observation by the Jedi High Council after the esteemed master had succumbed to a dangerous illness. While Finn attended to the ill and sometimes violent Jedi, her former Padawan, the a recently knighted Jedi, went in search of the lost Noetikons, ancient Jedi artifacts presumed to hold the answers to the illness.
